title: Express.js Skills
express-basics-description: Creating a server, handling requests and responses.
routing-description: Defining and handling routes, dynamic parameters, and wildcards.
middleware-description: Creating and using middleware functions in Express.js applications.
error-handling-description: Creating middleware for error handling, sending appropriate messages.
database-integration-description: Connecting to databases (MongoDB, MySQL), handling queries.
scalability-description: Application optimization techniques, server load management.
